stimulusHtml: Which of the following indicates which block, if either, will transfer energy by conduction at a faster rate, and provides a valid justification?

features.html: Two blocks are made from equal volumes of the same material. The blocks have the dimensions shown in the figure. The right side of each block is kept at a constant temperature T low and the left side is kept at a constant temperature T high .

choicesHtml: Block 1, because the thermal conductivity of the material increases with increasing length
Block 1, because there is a greater area in contact with the reservoirs and less distance between the reservoirs
Neither Block 1 nor Block 2, because the rate of energy transfer by conduction is an intrinsic property of the material
Neither Block 1 nor Block 2, because the decrease in the area that it is in contact with the reservoirs is offset by the increase in the length of the block
